title: Nub, Ascendant Vizier

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: **Oversee the Universe** â€” Learn up to two players' roles. If you have the Necronomicon, you may deal a Powerful attack to them instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, one Town role, one Mafia role, one Coven role, one Fallen Angel role, and one Neutral Killing role are each chosen at random. You gain an ability from each of those roles. You may use each of those abilities once.
- If, at any point, you have learned all non-Coven players' roles, the Coven wins the game and all non-Coven players lose the game.

desc:
Post 2011
*Neutrals are SO much more fun when you find them early and force them to side you!*
